Description:
Family-friendly Living on approx 576m2
Designed to take full advantage of its oversized allotment, this 4 bedroom family home presents an exciting lifestyle with its versatile floorplan, quality features throughout & prime location close to all of Craigieburn's desirable amenities.
Greeted by an expansive entrance hallway, the home's free-flowing interior boasts a large master bedroom with ensuite & walk-in-robe, additional bedrooms all with built-in-robes, separate designated study & well appointed stylish main bathroom. Multiple living zones include a separate formal lounge, spacious open-plan living & dining area enhanced by a gourmet stone-bench kitchen with stainless steel appliances & ample cupboard space.
Step outside and entertain with a oversized backyard providing great space for kids to play. Other features include heating, cooling, instant hot water, al-fresco area, plus the added advantage of a remote control double garage with internal access.
Within walking distance to Malcolm Creek Linear Park, Hyde Park Reserve, Craigieburn Primary School, Mount Ridley College, State Swim Centre, Childcare centres, local sports facilities, public transport & much more, this home offers great family living in a family-friendly location.
Insights: 46 Middlesborough Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Immediate Family Versatility with Big Block Potential
On a high-side block totalling some 680sqm in size, this extended home provides immediately
comfortable accommodation for the largest of families along with a range of options for those looking to renovate or renew in the future (STCA).
Well-presented interior comprises 7 bedrooms (all with built in robes), master ensuite, main
family bathroom & additional powder room. Multiple living zones include a light-filled rumpus/retreat (upstairs), central lounge through to the kitchen/dining area & rear family room complete with wood heater.
Features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, solid hardwood floors, family-sized
laundry & under-house cellar/storeroom, plus a backyard with undercover entertaining
area, large above-ground pool, double garage & adjoining workshop.
Walking distance to the bus stop (on Hothlyn Drive), primary & secondary schools, local parks & Aitken Creek trails, it's also close to childcare centres & kindergartens, Craigieburn Station, choice of shopping centres & easy freeway access.
Insights: 92 Hothlyn Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437
***SOLD AT AUCTION BY ADRIANO PERSICHETTI - 0402 055 437***Elite luxury and low-maintenance ease form the fabulous combination that defines this highly desirable family residence. An exceptional home equipped with every contemporary comfort in a prestigious setting close to Highlands Lake, this is and address that responds to modern day needs with spectacular style and success. Timber floors complement living/dining spaces accompanied by a stainless steel and caesar-stone fitted kitchen while 3 or 4 bedroom flexibility creates additional living, rumpus room or home office options in a design further enhanced by heating, cooling, a balcony retreat, a main bedroom with a superb ensuite and a sparkling central bathroom. Elegant lines, courtyard entertaining, a downstairs powder room, laundry and secure double garaging each make their own contribution to a home that's impressively appointed and perfectly positioned for lifestyle success, within easy reach of Craigieburn Central shopping, bike paths and first class community and recreation facilities.

Description:
Picture-Perfect Family Lifestyle!
Beautifully appointed & immaculately presented, this feature-packed 4 bedroom home is a must-see for growing families with its intelligently-zoned floorplan, quality inclusions & impeccable garden surrounds.
Ready to simply move in & enjoy, the home's light-filled interior boasts a master bedroom with private ensuite & large walk-in robe, 3 additional bedrooms (all with mirrored built-in robes) & main family bathroom. Adding to the appeal is an expansive open-plan living/dining area accompanied by a tastefully-appointed kitchen complete with breakfast bar, walk-in pantry, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Ducted heating & split-system air conditioning provide year-round comfort, along with stone
benchtops (kitchen & bathrooms), solar/gas hot water, NBN connection, home theatre projector & screen, large laundry & ample storage options, plus al-fresco entertaining area, landscaped back garden & remote-control double garage with internal entry.
A short stroll to parks, playgrounds & sports facilities, Newbury Primary School, childcare
centre, local shops & Newbury Boulevard buses, it also offers easy access to Malcolm Creek
trails & Highlands Shopping Centre. Perfect!
Insights: 13 Barnell Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Near New Family Home with A Location To Match!!
This Modern Home Design has a striking street appearance. Finished beautifully and boasting amazing features it has to be seen to be believed. Offering 4 bedrooms master with ensuite and walk in robes remaining bedrooms all of which enjoy built in robes.
A family bathroom of equal quality and style conveniently serves the remaining three bedrooms.
Desirably situated close to Parks, new schools, child care centre, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, this home gives value a whole new meaning.
The carefully considered open plan layout maximises the utility of the area, and creates a home able to meet the needs of a busy and growing family.
The family and dining room are complemented by a direct access to the outdoor alfresco, providing this unique property to offer simple pleasures in an impressive manner.
Let's not forget to mention the neat and elegantly designed kitchen, ideal for entertaining, featured with 900mm S/S appliances, 40mm stone benchtops, soft close drawers, Dishwasher and an envious size Butler's Pantry with another gas burner & oven 900 mm appliances.
The alfresco leads you to the back yard with low maintenance, delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.
Other features include - Refrigerated Cooling/Heating, Downlights, Alarm system, Intercom, Floating floor boards throughout, Blinds, Double remote garage with internal/ external access, Storage in garage, Separate living area, Fully tiled bathroom, Stone to bathroom & laundry, Tiled Alfresco and Good size rear yard.
The Luxury inclusions of this home are numerous and at large. You owe it to yourself to view it and appreciate what's on offer.
Don't miss out.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Perfectly Positioned And Proportioned Package
This single level home offers designer styling, a floorplan that works so well and a wonderful family friendly location. An easy walk to the primary school, parklands and the bus to the station, Highlands and Craigieburn Central are within easy reach to satisfy your dining, shopping and café needs.
A spacious light filled living and meals zone wrapping around the stainless steel equipped kitchen opens through multiple points to a sunny alfresco space, in a rear yard long on relaxing and short on maintaining.
Three bedrooms including main with ensuite deliver just the right amount of accommodation options for young families, first home buyers or even those seeking a lock and leave lifestyle.
Ducted heating and cooling, garage, landscaped front yard, shed and colorbond fences only add to the appeal of an affordable, perfectly positioned and proportioned package.
This property is being sold with LongView Guaranteed Rent for $390 p.w for up to 5 years.
***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS***

Description:
Brand New Style of Living
If you need plenty of space for the family, this fantastic newly built home is certainly one to take into consideration. With its instant street appeal & a perfect floor plan that will accommodate all your families needs, this amazing Metricon home will excite your senses.
A centrally located living area, that features a large kitchen with a walk in pantry & a dining & family room, is only the beginning of what this home has to offer. A large private master bedroom, with ensuite & walk-in-robe, is separated completely from the other 3 bedrooms ensuring plenty of parental privacy & living room at the front of the home equates to a great family home.
Loaded with quality extras including a double remote garage with internal access, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, solar gas boosted hot water service, LED down lights to entry & living areas, letterbox, clothesline, alarm, professionally landscaped gardens all around including an alfresco on a great family sized allotment of 392m2.
This amazing package is well located close to Highlands Shopping Centre, Highlands Hotel, local shops & suitable for families with primary school, Newbury Child & Community Centre & beautiful parks with walking tracks all close by. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!

Description:
EASY LIVING AND ENTERTAINING ON 480M2 Approx
Nestled in the heart of Craigieburn, only moments from an extensive list of amenities and major arterial roads, first home buyers or investors can bask in a private and peaceful surrounding whilst enjoying the space the of a stylish back garden and extensive decked alfresco on those summer evenings.
Comprising a large light-filled lounge room, spacious dining/kitchen area, a central bathroom shared by 3 robed bedrooms of which the master bedroom entails a walk in robe, all complimented with a spacious undercover decked alfresco and back yard, perfect for summer bbqs and entertaining guests.
Additional features include: auto-security roller shutters to all external windows, 3x cctv cameras, brand new ducted heating, evaporative cooling, split system, alarm, automatic garage doors (front and rear), new electric oven and NBN.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 29 Mulberry Pass, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Modern Family home with Low Maintenance life style!
Low Maintenance and comfortable lifestyle with ideal location is sure to impress. Comprising of 4 good size bedrooms, main bedroom with full en suite and walk in robe, open plan kitchen / meals area with stone bench tops adjoining living area, central main bathroom, separate laundry and toilet. Features Include-; Stainless steel appliances including 900ml 5 Burner stainless steel upright stove with oven, ducted heating, split system cooling, remote control garage with internal access and low maintenance landscaped gardens. Situated in the very sought after Malcolm Creek Estate, located only moments away from Newbury Primary School, Highlands Hotel, Highlands Shopping Centre, Public transport, Local sporting facilities, parks and eateries!

Description:
Designer Luxury in Desirable Locale
Offering a perfect balance of space, style and convenience, this radiant FOUR bedroom town home delivers smart low maintenance living with swift access to key lifestyle assets. This impressive residence features a light and bright open-plan living area, where a central modern kitchen with walk in pantry & stainless steel appliances flanked by an inviting living space and sun-kissed dining area, which integrates with the private and low maintenance large backyard.
A key feature of this move-straight-into residence is the intelligent zoning of three spacious bedrooms upstairs; the master complete with walk in robes & ensuite, striking main bathroom and bedrooms with built in mirrored robes.
Enhancing this property's indisputable appeal is ducted heating & split system cooling, a remote double garage with internal access, three toilets and a sensational location within walking distance of Newbury Child and Community Centre, Newbury Primary School and bus services and moments to Stockland Highlands Shopping Centre.

Description:
Dare to Dream Opposite Parkland
Sure to make an impression that lasts, this luxurious family home is well situated within the Highlands Estate set on a large block of approx. 512m2.
On offer are good sized bedrooms, HUGE master with double vanity ensuite and walk in robe, a well-appointed kitchen with 60mm stone bench top, 900mm SS Bosch appliances, dishwasher and walk-in pantry, adjoining to the open plan meals and family area along with separate formal lounge and large decking alfresco area with landscaped gardens.
A Long list of other extras include a double garage, two separate powder rooms, ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, gas fireplace, quality window furnishings including timber plantation shutters, chic light fittings, Bosh security alarm system with multiple cameras, intercom, 7kw solar system (28 solar panels), ducted vacuum and down lights.
Within close proximity to local amenities as well as Craigieburn Central, Highlands Shopping Precinct & Hotel, and just a stone throw away from local parkland, public transport, schools & sporting facilities. Inspect fast as this one won't last!

Description:
Easy-Living Quality & Class!
Modern low-maintenance perfection, this single-level sensation is set to impress with its efficient design, long list of features & brilliantly convenient location making it a must-see for first-time buyers, young families & downsizers alike!
Impeccable from start to finish, the home's inviting interior comprises 3 bedrooms (all with
mirrored built-in robes), master ensuite & main central bathroom - both with stone-top
vanities. Add to this a light-filled open living/dining area complemented by a sleek stone-bench kitchen complete with Technika cooking appliances along with an extra-large walk-in
pantry.
Other highlights include ducted heating throughout, double blinds, NBN connection, full-size
laundry with access to its own courtyard, plus rear yard & remote-control garage with
internal entry. Walking distance to parks, playgrounds & sports facilities, Newbury Primary School, childcare centre, local shops & Newbury Boulevard buses, it also offers easy access to Malcolm Creek trails & Highlands Shopping Centre.

Description:
Versatile Family Living on 480sqm
Nestled in a secluded cul-de-sac with immediate access to Fairways renowned open spaces,
this single-level 4 bedroom home provides a terrific family environment with its free-flowing design, quality inclusions & abundance of natural light throughout.
Surprisingly spacious interior boasts a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms (all with built-in robes), main central bathroom & separate WC. Flexible living zones include a light-filled lounge & adjoining dining area or study/home office, spacious open family/meals area & kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances.
Other features of the home include ducted heating & evaporative cooling throughout, alarm
system as well as a solar power system (12 panels). Step outside to a wonderfully spacious undercover entertaining area plus a veggie garden, outdoor sauna, two additional undercover patios, lock-up garage with TV points, skylight, full lighting, heating and cooling as well as an additional sideway parking space.
A short stroll to The Greenway & Fairways Lake Reserve, it's close to public transport,
childcare facilities, easy access to primary & secondary schools, Craigieburn Golf Course & Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre.
Insights: 3 Sunnybrook Court, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Truly A Masterpiece In Aston
Exceptional design and luxurious appointments are artistically presented within this brand new residence. Discerning family buyers will appreciate the premier location in the Aston Estate. Crafted to provide a rich and rewarding lifestyle, where sumptuous finishes and harmonious lines soothe the eye and comfort the soul. All is refined and considered.
This home at Quartet displays the architect's virtuoso orchestration of light, sound and space to create an environment where you can truly relax. Four bedroom, single storey
residence with double garage and private garden space.
The interior continues the theme of functional, luxury, drawing inspiration from top selection for colour schemes, materials and detailing. A theater, for quiet time. A butler's pantry, to keep your entertainer kitchen free from clutter. Cabinets are fine pieces of work.
Bathrooms are lavish with premium stone and European fittings, because luxury belongs to equally in your most private spaces.
Hints of classic deco era styling, with striking trims to the windows and doorways. Precious material and finishes, immaculate detailing and an emphasis on quality.
Add this home to your inspection list as inspections will not disappoint. Nothing to do but simply move in & start living, it also offers easy access to the area's popular schools & shopping centres, parks , public transport & major arterials. Call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

Description:
SOLD BY TEAM SKAD !!
Boutique 2 levels development
Total 28 Apartments
ETA Under-construction Mid 2019 - Completion Aug 2020.
1 & 2-Bedrooms sizes from 57.8sqm to 89.5sqm
All apartments come with 1 Car Park space with Storage Over-Bonnet
Price from $329,900 to $399,900
11 Shop Outlets on Ground level - Currently leased to a Medical Centre, a Café, an Estate Agency & a Hair Dresser.
Rental Appraisal:- 1 bedroom $325 per week, 2 bedroom $ 360 per week
Outgoing fees: - 1 bedroom - $800 to $950 per annum, 2 bedroom $1000 to $1100 per annum. Council rate : $1250 per annum
FREE BLINDS to all apartments
5 min drive to Craigieburn Train Station
3 min drive to Craigieburn Shopping District
16 min drive to Melbourne Airport
40 min drive to Melbourne CBD
Domain Craigieburn Suburb news https://www.domain.com.au/news/the-suburbs-most-popular-for-victorian-first-home-buyers-march-2019-819204/
Located just 34km north of Melbourne's CBD, the Highlander is situated in the heart of the highly acclaimed Highlands Estate in Craigieburn and will incorporate 28 one and two bedroom apartments. It will comprise over three levels, with office and retail outlets on the ground level.
It is 6-star energy rated and offers an exciting opportunity for purchasers to create their own treasured and precious memories, or invest in a unique development. This estate boasts plenty of shopping, transport options, and secure parking.
For more information please contact Dave Singh - 0430 327 172.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character to all home buyers and investors alike. Offering 4 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, main bathroom, large open plan meals area with adjoining family room, alarm system, single lock up garage with remote control entry and internal access, ducted heating, split system cooling and much more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including local schools & shops, shopping centers, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!
Insights: 5 Fermont Avenue, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Decent Size Family home for sale! Highlands
Four Bedroom Delight!
This fantastic four bedroom home is ideal for a family!
Kitchen is fitted with stone bench top, stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, gas stove top and oven, with an abundance of cupboard space.
First floor consist of Separate lounge area, powder room, laundry room and spacious dining area overlooking back yard.
Second floor consist of 4 spacious bedrooms, Master bedroom fitted with ensuite and WIR, Bright central bathroom with washroom and bath and separate living area.
Additional features include ducted heating and cooling throughout, double garage with remote control and 2 Separate living area.
Located within proximity to bus, trains, local shops, highland shopping center and Hume Anglican grammar school
Secure your inspection today - you will be impressed!
Insights: 128 Grevillea Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.
